This is a great game. Is old but fun.

I really want to cry. I came back to those days when I spent my time mostly on Zombie Escape servers that I loved deeply. And here they are again. I'm so happy about it that I can't even pick up the words to write a proper review. I can feel that love and warmth of the past that got onto me. It's gold, and it will be, forever.

It's better that CS:GO, for sure, too.

Buy it. Don't be so soulless.

Pretty good game, yes. 

Love the Cs games :)

Recomendado lo juego mucho y no se pensaria que es mejor que cs go pero la verdad no pero este juego aun no se olvida! tenia la version pirata y tenia unos errores con los terros y los polis pero fueron solucionados aca y la verdad recomiendo el juego!
Really fun Counter-Strike game, maybe more fun than CS:GO.

If you have come to this game expecting a great comeptitive shooter, you have come to the wrong place. But if want a fun a game with a lot of different gamemodes and community map you have come to the right place. Infinite number of different maps, gamemodes, sprays, and to top it all of, a giant head hitbox
Every CS game is perfect, don't even think about buying it just do it, u will thank me. CS marks your life, it did for me and im so happy.
